name: Puppies Out
description:
Puppies Out! The Cutest, Fun and Original Free 3D Endless Runner games!

Attention all fun and puppy lovers out there!

Puppies Out! is a free Running games for kids featuring lovely cute pets – named “Buddy Lab” – alongside with some of its adorable puppy friends including “Amigo“, “Rocky“, “Sir Beagle“, “Posh Pup” , “Super Hero“, “Bandit” and “Valentine“. 

They live in a happy, fantasy dog world where running is the key to success! Tough obstacles and challenges await them, but the puppies are ready for it! 

Explore 3d Infinite Runner Game Great Features:

• Explore Fun-Tasy Puppy Worlds!
• Enjoy Gorgeous Graphics while collecting life-saving Silver Bones.
• 23 cute and legendary puppies as playable characters to choose from !
• Personalize and style your pet game and collect amazing Paw-Ur-Ups!
• Puppies include Labrador, Beagle, Bulldog, Husky and Doge.
• Run through a colorful, lively 3D landscape.
• Get rewarded with Lives as you win or via sharing the App on social media.
• Upgrades available as you play: Shields, Mystery Boxes, Magnetic Collars, Frisbee and Jet Packs.
• Increase mission levels and difficulty: run and slide through residential areas, garden areas, bridges, construction areas and parks.
• Share the fun of 3D Infinite Runner on Facebook and on Game center Services.

This top exciting dogs games for kids, girls, and adults just need you to bring them to life.

In this new, free play and best puppy game every level is an adventure and every mission is a discovery. Make sure you win and never stop running! 

Let the puppies out in this pets game! & start playing! Make the most of the running, racing, jumping and chasing! In this lovely kids game Puppy Dog does it all!
